capabilityDescription.en: Incrementally fetches data from Zendesk API.
capabilityDescription.zh: 增量地从Zendesk API获取数据。

en.description: Password or authentication token for Zendesk login user.

zh.description: Zendesk登录用户的密码或身份验证令牌。

en.description: The particular Zendesk resource which is meant to be exported.
Initial timestamp to query Zendesk API from in Unix timestamp seconds format.

zh.description: 以Unix时间戳秒格式从中查询Zendesk API的初始时间戳。

en.description: Controller service for HTTP client operations.

zh.description: HTTP客户端操作的控制器服务。

en.description: Type of authentication to Zendesk API.

success.en: For FlowFiles created as a result of a successful HTTP request.
success.zh: 对于由于成功的HTTP请求而创建的FlowFiles。

statefulDescription.en: Paging cursor for Zendesk API is stored. Cursor is updated after each successful request.
statefulDescription.zh: 存储Zendesk API的分页光标。每次成功请求后都会更新光标。

record.count.en: The number of records fetched by the processor.
